channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mike Johnson faces brief GOP revolt over Trump tariffs
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) faced a short-lived Republican revolt on Tuesday against his efforts to block the House from voting to end Presiden...

item.title: Democrats respond to Ilhan Omar censure vote with in-kind push against Cory Mills
item.description: A House Democrat responded Tuesday to GOP efforts to censure Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.) by forcing his own vote to censure Rep. Cory Mills (R-Fla.). Wh...

item.title: Trump extends TikTok deadline again as deal promise looms
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday extended the deadline for a ban on TikTok again, this time until December, as reports indicated a potential deal with China...

item.title: Free speech fight shifts
item.description: President Trump's $15 billion lawsuit against the New York Times — his fifth complaint against a major news company in the past two years — represents...

item.title: "One of one": Kirk assassination leaves vacuum for MAGA's outside enforcers
item.description: Charlie Kirk's assassination has dealt a significant blow to MAGA's ability to pressure Washington and the Republican Party from outside the White Hou...

item.title: More employers fire workers over Kirk posts as pressure from right mounts
item.description: Actions by employers have stirred a debate over employees’ speech rights, the role of pressure campaigns and what is appropriate public debate after a...

item.title: Trump files defamation and libel lawsuit against New York Times
item.description: President accuses the newspaper and its reporters of defaming him in a book and three articles he said were “false and defamatory.”

item.title: Trump discloses U.S. targeted a third alleged drug boat from Venezuela
item.description: The president acknowledged the incident while delivering a warning to Venezuela’s president, Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: More Epstein documents come from the Hill
item.description: The House Oversight Committee released a list of contacts, a deposition with former Attorney General Bill Barr and other documents.

item.title: Bill Cassidy cast the key vote for RFK Jr. What is he thinking now?
item.description: The GOP senator has invited Susan Monarez, the former CDC director, to testify about her concerns that Kennedy is threatening vaccine access in Americ...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
